column5: Heading up to Gullrock in two weeks. Was wondering if the wildfires in the area are anything to be concerned with.

Always need to be concerened about fires.either with the fire itself or smoke.have a cold front in right now and we have had some rain and atvthis moment we are having some lught snow.this will all help the battle.couple of big fires on the manitoba/ontario border which are quit big.fire bans are on.just have to see what is going on in the next few days.
Thanks. Brother was up there in the 80's and they had a large fire in the area. All the ash falling in the water completely shut the fishing down.
